Java SE 14 & JDK 14
DRAFT 14-crac+0-adhoc..jdk

Uses of Interface
javax.sound.midi.MidiDevice

Packages that use MidiDevice 
Package Description
javax.sound.midi
Provides interfaces and classes for I/O, sequencing, and synthesis of MIDI (Musical Instrument Digital Interface) data.
javax.sound.midi.spi
Supplies interfaces for service providers to implement when offering new MIDI devices, MIDI file readers and writers, or sound bank readers.

  • Uses of MidiDevice in javax.sound.midi

    Subinterfaces of MidiDevice in javax.sound.midi 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    interface  Sequencer
    A hardware or software device that plays back a MIDI sequence is known as a sequencer.
    interface  Synthesizer
    A Synthesizer generates sound.
    Methods in javax.sound.midi that return MidiDevice 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    MidiDevice MidiDeviceReceiver.getMidiDevice()
    Obtains a MidiDevice object which is an owner of this Receiver.
    MidiDevice MidiDeviceTransmitter.getMidiDevice()
    Obtains a MidiDevice object which is an owner of this Transmitter.
    static MidiDevice MidiSystem.getMidiDevice​(MidiDevice.Info info)
    Obtains the requested MIDI device.

  • Uses of MidiDevice in javax.sound.midi.spi

    Methods in javax.sound.midi.spi that return MidiDevice 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract MidiDevice MidiDeviceProvider.getDevice​(MidiDevice.Info info)
    Obtains an instance of the device represented by the info object.
